name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing and deploying advanced machine learning solutions across multiple platforms. Strong expertise in **Python**, **PyTorch**, **TensorFlow**, **ML infrastructure**, and **Deployment**, with proven ability to lead ML projects from conception to deployment using frameworks such as **Dask** and **PySpark**. Proficient in utilizing **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** cloud services for scalable solutions, alongside containerization technologies including **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for efficient application management. Familiar with real-time monitoring and debugging strategies to optimize ML workflows effectively.
Skilled in machine learning practices, including model optimization, monitoring, and collaboration within cross-functional teams to ensure the successful delivery of AI-driven applications. History of building impactful systems within the healthcare and finance sectors, adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Excels in leveraging modern technologies such as **Apache Beam** and **LangChain** for sophisticated data processing and analytics, while fostering trust and collaboration across project teams.
